title: jottacloud: metadata isn't set properly on server side copy and move
body:
In 41b1250eafcb8018160659a68f22f2e31e50780c we added tests for correct behaviour for or Metadata on server side Move and Copy

At this point the integration tests for Jottacloud started failing

```
"go test -v -timeout 1h0m0s -remote TestJottacloud: -verbose -test.run '^TestIntegration$/^FsMkdir$/^FsPutFiles$/^FsCopy$/^Metadata$|^TestIntegration$/^FsMkdir$/^FsPutFiles$/^FsMove$/^Metadata$'" - Starting (try 5/5)
```

giving

```
=== RUN   TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsCopy/Metadata
    fstest.go:122: 
        	Error Trace:	/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:122
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:127
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:146
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:190
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:303
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:333
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:339
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstests/fstests.go:1310
        	Error:      	Should be true
        	Test:       	TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsCopy/Metadata
        	Messages:   	test metadata copied.txt: Modification time difference too big |9456h0m0.499999999s| > 1s (want 2004-03-03 04:05:06.499999999 +0000 UTC vs got 2003-02-03 04:05:06 +0000 UTC) (precision 1s)
    fstest.go:122: 
        	Error Trace:	/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:122
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:606
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstests/fstests.go:1313
        	Error:      	Should be true
        	Test:       	TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsCopy/Metadata
        	Messages:   	test metadata copied.txt: Modification time difference too big |9456h0m0.499999999s| > 1s (want 2004-03-03 04:05:06.499999999 +0000 UTC vs got 2003-02-03 04:05:06 +0000 UTC) (precision 1s)
    fstest.go:122: 
        	Error Trace:	/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:122
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:606
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstests/fstests.go:1315
        	Error:      	Should be true
        	Test:       	TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsCopy/Metadata
        	Messages:   	test metadata copied.txt: Modification time difference too big |9456h0m0.499999999s| > 1s (want 2004-03-03 04:05:06.499999999 +0000 UTC vs got 2003-02-03 04:05:06 +0000 UTC) (precision 1s)
```

and

```
=== RUN   TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsMove/Metadata
    fstest.go:122: 
        	Error Trace:	/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:122
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:127
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:146
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:190
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:303
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:333
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:339
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstests/fstests.go:1418
        	Error:      	Should be true
        	Test:       	TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsMove/Metadata
        	Messages:   	test metadata moved.txt: Modification time difference too big |9456h0m0.499999999s| > 1s (want 2004-03-03 04:05:06.499999999 +0000 UTC vs got 2003-02-03 04:05:06 +0000 UTC) (precision 1s)
    fstest.go:122: 
        	Error Trace:	/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:122
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:606
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstests/fstests.go:1421
        	Error:      	Should be true
        	Test:       	TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsMove/Metadata
        	Messages:   	test metadata moved.txt: Modification time difference too big |9456h0m0.499999999s| > 1s (want 2004-03-03 04:05:06.499999999 +0000 UTC vs got 2003-02-03 04:05:06 +0000 UTC) (precision 1s)
    fstest.go:122: 
        	Error Trace:	/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:122
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:606
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstests/fstests.go:1423
        	Error:      	Should be true
        	Test:       	TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsMove/Metadata
        	Messages:   	test metadata moved.txt: Modification time difference too big |9456h0m0.499999999s| > 1s (want 2004-03-03 04:05:06.499999999 +0000 UTC vs got 2003-02-03 04:05:06 +0000 UTC) (precision 1s)
```

These are caused by the jottacloud backend not picking up metadata set by --metadata-set and the metadata mapper.

Similar fixes were made for google drive: 9f2ce2c7fc330f6441749a3e51325189e5001d48 and local: 6e85a39e9997189d1b828b49a2dc8049c67ad138

@albertony do you fancy taking a look at this since you added the metadata support to the jotta backend? Thank you
